rev.desc.rev.desc: update panel populate.cm3r.env and populate.cm3t.env, add license check
The Linker background process is unable to update Interactions if Folder Entitlement is enabled
[Mononoke] 'Mass Update' menu is missing in Payment Queue
change populate.cm3r.env/populate.cm3t.env to set db.complex, db.template value as expert
Process Designer Template Edit Wizard no longer shows Change/Task Templates.
QCCR1E71115 - Approval Inbox is not listing the change tickets for Change Approver
Added below line in the Panel: populate.cm3r.env

QCRQ1E65843: Task4: Move the RAD applications modified by the PD team from Perforce to SVN QC Ref. QCCR1E68471 - Fix for approval names in the $G.myGroups table. Needed to always add current user nameQC Ref. QCCR68359 - System becomes locked after the "Record has been Modified" message.QC Ref. QCCR69949 - "Approval delegation" menu is not available for change approver in the upgraded system RAD: cm3.setup.environmentPanel: build.myGroupsChange: Changed the exit from "exit.normal" to "fix.myGroups" Changed the exit from "exit.normal" to "build.cm3r.env" RAD: cm3.setup.environmentPanel: fix.myGroupsChange: New process panel RAD: cm3.setup.environmentPanel: call.setup.objectChange: Changed the exit from "decide.build" to "init.cm3environment" RAD: cm3.setup.environmentPanel: decide.buildChange: Move up the exit to "build.myGroups" RAD: cm3.setup.environmentPanel: populate.cm3r.envChange: Added the following expressions: groups in $G.cm3r.environment=member.of in $G.myGroups approval.groups in $G.cm3r.environment=approver.of in $G.myGroups approve.delegate in $G.cm3r.environment=jscall("security.hasRight", "Change", "approve.delegate") RAD: cm3.setup.environmentPanel: populate.cm3t.envChange: Added the following expressions: groups in $G.cm3t.environment=member.of in $G.myGroups approval.groups in $G.cm3t.environment=approver.of in $G.myGroups approve.delegate in $G.cm3t.environment=jscall("security.hasRight", "Change Task", "approve.delegate")
Add call to initialize myGroups record for the user
Modified code in populate.cm3t.env panel to set the $G.cm3t.environment variable as per Change Tasks security area.
Modified for new EAF security. Legacy variables will be set for safety.
Now will always rebuild from scratch if user is in multiple profile groups.
It wasn't proceeding to setup the task environment if the request environment setup found that the user was not authorized to use Changes.

descript.descript: update panel populate.cm3r.env and populate.cm3t.env, add license check
The Linker background process is unable to update Interactions if Folder Entitlement is enabled
[Mononoke] 'Mass Update' menu is missing in Payment Queue
Process Designer Template Edit Wizard no longer shows Change/Task Templates.
QCCR1E71115 - Approval Inbox is not listing the change tickets for Change Approver
Added below line in the Panel: populate.cm3r.env

QCRQ1E65843: Task4: Move the RAD applications modified by the PD team from Perforce to SVN QC Ref. QCCR1E68471 - Fix for approval names in the $G.myGroups table. Needed to always add current user nameQC Ref. QCCR68359 - System becomes locked after the "Record has been Modified" message.QC Ref. QCCR69949 - "Approval delegation" menu is not available for change approver in the upgraded system RAD: cm3.setup.environmentPanel: build.myGroupsChange: Changed the exit from "exit.normal" to "fix.myGroups" Changed the exit from "exit.normal" to "build.cm3r.env" RAD: cm3.setup.environmentPanel: fix.myGroupsChange: New process panel RAD: cm3.setup.environmentPanel: call.setup.objectChange: Changed the exit from "decide.build" to "init.cm3environment" RAD: cm3.setup.environmentPanel: decide.buildChange: Move up the exit to "build.myGroups" RAD: cm3.setup.environmentPanel: populate.cm3r.envChange: Added the following expressions: groups in $G.cm3r.environment=member.of in $G.myGroups approval.groups in $G.cm3r.environment=approver.of in $G.myGroups approve.delegate in $G.cm3r.environment=jscall("security.hasRight", "Change", "approve.delegate") RAD: cm3.setup.environmentPanel: populate.cm3t.envChange: Added the following expressions: groups in $G.cm3t.environment=member.of in $G.myGroups approval.groups in $G.cm3t.environment=approver.of in $G.myGroups approve.delegate in $G.cm3t.environment=jscall("security.hasRight", "Change Task", "approve.delegate") Add call to initialize myGroups record for the user
Modified code in populate.cm3t.env panel to set the $G.cm3t.environment variable as per Change Tasks security area.
Modified for new EAF security. Legacy variables will be set for safety.
Now will always rebuild from scratch if user is in multiple profile groups.
It wasn't proceeding to setup the task environment if the request environment setup found that the user was not authorized to use Changes.
